section.p: To renounce the worship of Elnir, you must pay 40 Shards to the priesthood by way of compensation. The high priest fixes you with a stern gaze. ‘Not everyone has the strength of character to make a good worshipper of Lord Elnir,’ he says, nodding. ‘Find yourself a less demanding deity.’

Do you want to change your mind?
If you are determined to renounce your faith,
pay the 40 Shards and delete Elnir from the God box
on your Adventure Sheet.
